ALTERNATIVES.Definition: things that can be used instead of

DURABLE.Definition: able to last and be used for a long time

INSULATING.Definition: stopping heat, sound or electricity from escaping or entering

SHORTSIGHTED.Definition: not showing enough consideration or thinking

EXAGGERATION.Definition: something that makes it seem more important that it really is

DECOMPOSITION.Definition: the process of going bad, decaying

SHELF LIFE.Definition: the length of time for which an item can remain usable

SYRINGES.Definition: devices used to put fluids into or collect them from the body using needles

STERILE.Definition: free from bacteria or other living microorganisms

PACEMAKERS.Definition: small devices that are placed in the chest to help control the heartbeat

BLISTER PACKS.Definition: cards that package medicine within small, clear, plastic bubbles

BUMPERS.Definition: horizontal bars fixed across the front or back of a motor vehicle to reduce damage if there is an accident

TIPPING.Definition: emptying (by holding it at an angle)

EXCEPTION.Definition: something that is excluded from that statement

MELTED.Definition: turned into a liquid by using heat

MELT.Definition: turn it into a liquid by using heat

NON-ZERO.Definition: other than rezo, not equal to zero

COTTON.Definition: a soft white substance which surrounds the seeds of the cotton plant

COMPLEMENTED.Definition: combined (with) to provide the best results

CRITICISM.Definition: the act of saying that it is bad

STRAWS.Definition: thin hollow tubes for drinking from a glass or bottle

OBJECT.Definition: thing to which criticism is directed

BANNED.Definition: prohibited or forbidden the use of

STRAW.Definition: a thin hollow tube for drinking from a glass or bottle

RENEWED.Definition: restored, having new life and more energy

PUNCHLINE.Definition: phrase that makes the point or explains the meaning of it all

REVOLVE AROUND.Definition: have it as the main subject or interest

CONTAMINATION.Definition: the state of containing unwanted substances

UNDERSTATED.Definition: represented as being less important than it really is

SUGAR CANE.Definition: the main part or stem of the sugar plant

COMPOSTED.Definition: made into a mixture of organic substance

JURY IS STILL OUT.Definition: it hasn't yet been decided if it's good or not

PRIORITIES.Definition: things that are considered more important than other ones
